scripts.codegen:portal: npm run setup:portal && tsx scripts/codegen-project.ts portal
scripts.codegen:public-file: npm run setup:public-file && tsx scripts/codegen-project.ts public-file
scripts.load:ci:portal: cd load-tests && python -m locust -f locustfiles/portal_with_auth.py --headless -u 20 -r 5 -t 60s --html reports/portal-report.html
scripts.load:ci:public-file: cd load-tests && python -m locust -f locustfiles/public_file_with_auth.py --headless -u 10 -r 2 -t 60s --html reports/public-file-report.html
scripts.test:portal:full: npm run setup:portal && npm run test:portal && npm run load:ci:portal
scripts.test:public-file:full: npm run setup:public-file && npm run test:public-file && npm run load:ci:public-file
scripts.test:all:full: npm run test:portal:full && npm run test:public-file:full
